original_text: Now it came to pass on the third day, that Esther put on her royal apparel, and stood in the inner court of the king's house, over against the king's house: and the king sat upon his royal throne in the royal house, over against the gate of the house.
korean_text: 제삼일에 에스더가 왕후의 예복을 입고 왕궁 안 뜰 곧 어전 맞은편에 서니 왕이 어전에서 전 문을 대하여 왕좌에 앉았다가

sentences.original_text: Now it came to pass on the third day
that Esther put on her royal apparel
and stood in the inner court of the king's house
and the king sat upon his royal throne
over against the gate of the house
